org.opendaylight.controller.northbound.commons.exception

Class ResourceForbiddenException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException
            • org.opendaylight.controller.northbound.commons.exception.ResourceForbiddenException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ResourceForbiddenException
extends javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException
    Status Code 403 (Forbidden) The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it. Authorization will not help and the request SHOULD NOT be repeated. If the request method was not HEAD and the server wishes to make public why the request has not been fulfilled, it SHOULD describe the reason for the refusal in the entity. If the server does not wish to make this information available to the client, the status code 404 (Not Found) can be used instead.
    See Also:
